the -w / --watch parameter behaves strangely in the latest version. Why on earth does it generate a DIFF markup every time source file is modified? This is completely and utterly useless.

Any particular reason for this design?

I haven't seen this behavior.  Can you give more information on where you're seeing it, like what OS and OS version you are running?
